items.sentence: I have better things to do than sit here just waiting for Tom to get here.
Tom called me a party pooper because I left the party just after midnight.
I wonder whether or not Tom still drives the car his grandfather gave him.
When we are asleep, bodily functions slow down and body temperature falls.
No matter how many times I've been shown, I just can't learn to tie a tie.
The special lecture was put off until the next day due to the bad weather.
Only Tom would use the purchase of a new TV as an excuse to throw a party.
If you want to study in the United States, you need to get a student visa.
Tom realized that he didn't have enough money to buy everything he wanted.
Tom realized that he didn't have enough time to do what needed to be done.
